price: Katakanlah, "Al-Qur`ān itu diturunkan oleh (Allah) yang mengetahui rahasia di langit dan di bumi. Sesungguhnya Dia adalah Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang."
arabic: قُلۡ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul anzalahu alladhī yaʿlamu al-sira fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi innahu kāna ghafūran raḥīman
